original_text: He said to the officer who was holding Paul, ‘Continue to guard this man carefully. But his friends can come and see him. They can help him and they can bring things for him.’
korean_text: 백부장에게 명하여 바울을 지키되 자유를 주고 그의 친구들이 그를 돌보아 주는 것을 금하지 말라 하니라

sentences.original_text: Continue to guard this man carefully
But his friends can come and see him
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그의 친구들은 와서 그를 만날 수 있다

sentences.original_text: and they can bring things for him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그를 위해 물건들을 가져올 수 있다
